Champs de données
$uid = -1
UID of the current message.
$files
structure used to store files attached to a mail
$altfiles
structure used to store alt files attached to a mail
$tags
Tag used to recognize embedded images of a mail.
$addtobody
Message to add to body to build ticket.
$fetch_emails = 0
Number of fetched emails.
$maxfetch_emails = 10
Maximum number of emails to fetch : default to 10.
$messages_uid = []
array of indexes -> uid for messages
$filesize_max = 0
Max size for attached files.
$dohistory = true
const REFUSED_FOLDER = 'refused'
const ACCEPTED_FOLDER = 'accepted'
const REQUESTER_FIELD_FROM = 0
const REQUESTER_FIELD_REPLY_TO = 1

Description détaillée
MailCollector class
Merge with collect GLPI system after big modification in it
modif and debug by INDEPNET Development Team. Original class ReceiveMail 1.0 by Mitul Koradia Created: 01-03-2006 Description: Reciving mail With Attechment Email: mitulkoradia@gmail.com

isResponseToMessageSentByAnotherGlpi() isResponseToMessageSentByAnotherGlpiMailCollector MailCollectorisResponseToMessageSentByAnotherGlpi
isResponseToMessageSentByAnotherGlpi (Message $message)
Check if message is a response to a message sent by another Glpi instance. Responses to GLPI messages should contains a InReplyTo or a References header that matches the MessageId from original message.

Message$message
Depuis
10.0.0
Renvoie
bool
